-| diffsc(hs1, universe)

‚ä£ d(hs1, ùïå)

comment: The set ` ( Walks `` G ) ` of all walks on ` G ` is a set of pairs by our definition of a walk, and so is a relation. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 30-Jun-2018.) (Revised by AV, 19-Feb-2021.)
